full_summary:
# W0127-240029: Request for Proposal - Cisco Switches
## Title
Caucus Leader for Ontario (via PSPC) invites bidders to respond to a Request for Proposal for the procurement of Cisco Switches: W0127-240029

## Solicitation Details
- **Solicitation Number**: WS4410810406
- **Publication Date**: 2024-01-31
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-02-26T14:00:00
- **Regions of Delivery**: Edmonton, Alberta
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
  Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage,
  Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

## End User
- **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
- **End User Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2

## Request for Proposal
The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting proposals for the purchase of Cisco Switches for the operation and distribution of the Consolidated Secret Network Infrastructure (CSNI) network.

## Trade Agreements
The proposed contract may be subject to the Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and other agreements eligible under the Memorandum of Understanding (MOU).

## Personelle Contact
 Luke Cao (SPAC/PSPC)
  luke.cao@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
  101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2

## Mandatory Documents
Bid submission will be performed through Ariba Discovery at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18655647?extsite=MTg2NTU2NDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18655647?extsite=MTg2NTU2NDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

***Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time***
All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2024-02-26 at 14:00 EST. Only bids submitted on or before 14
